name: Instagram Scraper 2023
title: Instagram Scraper 2023

api_list.name: Get Post Comments
api_list.description:
Get comments made on a post. 

Each post has a "pk" key.  To get the comments for a post, send the pk value of that post as media_pk in the url as query parameter

optional_parameters.name: min_id
optional_parameters.description: The value of next_min_id for viewing the current comments list

api_list.name: Get User Posts
api_list.description:
Get Instagram user posts. Max - 33
Use end_cursor to get the rest of the data

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: The value of next_max_id for viewing the current posts

api_list.name: Get User Info by Username
api_list.description: Get Instagram user info by username

api_list.name: Get User Followers

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: The value of next_max_id for viewing the followers list

api_list.name: Get User Following

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The value of next_max_id for viewing the following list

api_list.name: Get User ID
